title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 18
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 18
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST\u0010Dave Wilson \u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" National Research (NRCIA/NRCIB). National Research \u0010Corp.'s Class A shares are headed for their biggest advance in more than four years \u0010after the healthcare-services company offered to buy out almost all the owners of \u0010another class of stock. Holders of Class B stock other than founder and CEO Michael \u0010Hays would receive about $95 million for their stakes. The proposal calls for a
